faq.title: FAQs
faq.body: <0>Have more questions? You can <2>read more FAQs here</2> or email us at <5>team@codeday.org</5>.</0>

hero.short: The most beginner-friendly event for building amazing games and apps!
hero.long: CodeDay is a worldwide event where student artists, programmers, musicians, actors, and writers get together to build apps and games.
